section.heading: Distribution of money collected from rural city hospital tax.

content.p: Effective 5/13/2014 59-12-805. Distribution of money collected from rural city hospital tax. (1) Except as provided in Subsection 59-12-804(5) and Subsection (2) , all money collected from a tax under Section 59-12-804 shall be distributed quarterly by the city legislative body to rural city hospitals. (2) If there is more than one rural city hospital in a city, the money collected from a tax under Section 59-12-804 shall be distributed as determined by the city legislative body. Amended by Chapter 50 , 2014 General Session
Except as provided in Subsection and Subsection , all money collected from a tax under Section shall be distributed quarterly by the city legislative body to rural city hospitals.
If there is more than one rural city hospital in a city, the money collected from a tax under Section shall be distributed as determined by the city legislative body.
